email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Freight rate is $22/MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do $20/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $21/MT. Loading window is 48 hours, and demurrage is $15,000/day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

$21/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details and send over the charter party for review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find attached the charter party for your review. Let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
John
